e5cf1f81-0bb2-4ce7-8787-c52f06fc9b91.name: Attribute Substitution (Innate Attack based on Perception)

07a08355-e67d-45fd-8ce4-1bcc12034959.name: Code of Honor (Elven)
07a08355-e67d-45fd-8ce4-1bcc12034959.notes: Never allow needless harm to trees (“coral reefs,” for sea elves) or animals, and always seek to live with elegance and style. The world should be more beautiful and full of life for your efforts.

modifiers.name: Frequency: Constantly
modifiers.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

modifiers.name: Frequency: Hourly
modifiers.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

modifiers.name: Frequency: Daily
modifiers.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

modifiers.name: Frequency: Weekly
modifiers.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

modifiers.name: Frequency: Monthly
modifiers.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

modifiers.name: Frequency: Seasonally
modifiers.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

modifiers.name: Frequency: Yearly
modifiers.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

modifiers.name: Aging
modifiers.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

41c5c3d9-30ce-4874-93da-e5d3b3ab254d.name: Elven Gear
41c5c3d9-30ce-4874-93da-e5d3b3ab254d.notes: 10% off final price of gear qualified as "Elven" (GM's decision)

c006f90b-7596-48fe-a481-c502306b22cf.name: Passing Appearance (Androgynous)
c006f90b-7596-48fe-a481-c502306b22cf.notes: Looks don't trigger intolerance or bias against your sex

b377580f-7135-44be-8ae9-bae302a78243.name: Minor Claustrophobia
b377580f-7135-44be-8ae9-bae302a78243.notes: Applies if no indoor plants or windows to see the outside

610a2ffc-23dc-4816-9c2f-1aa218558514.name: Terraphobia (Ground)
610a2ffc-23dc-4816-9c2f-1aa218558514.notes: You are afraid of the ground, and are uncomfortable even seeing it.  If there's a chance of an actual fall from height, self-control rolls are at -5.

b024d19f-bec2-4caa-98cc-64587e05c527.name: Tree Walking
b024d19f-bec2-4caa-98cc-64587e05c527.notes: Can use full Move over the tops of trees

1864e496-d145-4169-b0c7-32de40719f3d.name: Terrain Adaptation (Clouds)
1864e496-d145-4169-b0c7-32de40719f3d.notes: No DX or Move penalty on magically firm but bumpy clouds
